字号大小一致/字号大小一致_0012.jpg.mt:
Thin skin and wrinkled leaves are my hallmark

Sunlight exposure time is long, the fruit leaves will dry up, the drier they are, the riper they become!

Because our pitaya grows in a tropical highland farm, with ample sunlight. Adequate natural growth light and rain dew nourishment will cause some fruits to have dryness, wrinkles, scars, black spots, and water cracks on their outer skin. These conditions are normal and do not affect the flesh of the fruit. On the contrary, this kind of pitaya that has experienced wind, sun, and rain is even sweeter and juicier.

Wrinkled skin
Water cracks, scars
Dry head, slightly black leaf scales

After picking, the stem of the pitaya is like aloe vera or cactus, with a lot of moisture. It can easily mold if it's not dry enough. You can directly cut off the stem or let it naturally open before eating. The flesh of the fruit is not affected. Do not purchase if you mind!
src: 日照时间长，果叶会干瘪，越瘪越熟哦！
因为我们的火龙果生长在热带高山农场，阳光照射充足，火龙果自然生长充分的光照和雨露滋润会使部分果子表皮有干枯、褶皱、疤痕、黑斑和水裂纹的现象，这些都情况是正常的，不会影响到果肉，反而这种经历过风吹日晒雨打、自然生长的火龙果才更加的香甜多汁。
火龙果摘果后把处就像芦荟或者仙人掌一样，水分很大很多，稍微不干燥就会发霉，可以直接将果把切掉或者不管它正常开果吃，果肉是没有影响的，介意勿拍！

Moisturizing and nourishing skin, lasting radiance

---

Membranous Milkvetch Root Extract

Contains important active ingredients Astragalosides, which can prevent skin oxidation to a certain extent and regulate skin condition.

---

Hydrating and Moisturizing

Paeonia Root Extract

Adopting natural Paeonia root extract, no preservatives or other chemical moisturizers are added, with the function of moisturizing.
src: 水润养肤 持久透亮
含有重要活性成分黄芪皂苷，能一定程度上防止皮肤氧化，调理皮肤状态。
采用天然芍药根提取物，不添加防腐剂和其他化学保湿剂，具有保湿的功效。
